researchers_stance: V3 proved what's expendable and what's load-bearing. Trimming ~20% helped some buckets (fomo_scroller surged to 75%) but hurt others (journal_graveyard crashed, city_explorer dropped 34pp). This round's primary value is diagnostic: it identified exactly which content elements drive conversion so V4 can make a data-driven hybrid. Annual pricing and taste analytics specificity were unambiguous wins.
exec_summary: Trimmed ~20% of page length. fomo_scroller surged (+25pp conv) and price perception hit best-ever. But journal_graveyard resonance crashed 25pp from removing the honesty line, and city_explorer conversion dropped 34pp from shortening cold-start context. V3's value is diagnostic: it proves which content is load-bearing.
findings:
• Page length was hurting fomo_scroller: 50% → 75% conversion from trimming alone. Shorter page = less friction for mobile scrollers.
  • Honesty line was load-bearing: Removing 'most apps die after a week. We know that.' crashed journal_graveyard resonance 25pp. Must be restored.
  • Cold-start context was load-bearing: Shortening city_explorer's cold-start from 4 sentences to 1 dropped conversion from 92% to 58%. Punchline alone isn't enough.
  • Specific examples were load-bearing: Removing '8/10 Thai place' dropped taste_curator conversion 8pp.
  • $99/year was an unambiguous win: 'Too expensive' dropped from 27% to 17%. Best price perception ever.
  • Taste analytics specificity landed: 'Neighborhoods, friend comparisons, category pickiness' drove taste_curator to 92% resonance.
recommendations:
1. Restore the honesty line in the retention section opening.
  2. Restore the specific rating examples as a single compact line in the solution section.
  3. Expand cold-start to 2 sentences (not back to 4). Right-size the context around 'first it's your map.'
  4. Keep the tighter problem section. The merged fomo_scroller paragraph is driving their best results.
  5. Keep annual pricing and taste analytics specificity. Unambiguous wins.
qualitative_themes:
• Missing the honesty line (4 mentions, journal_graveyard): 'That was the most honest thing I'd read on a landing page.'
  • Shorter page is better for mobile (6 mentions, fomo_scroller/city_explorer): 'I read every word without skimming.'
  • $99/year is the right anchor (5 mentions): 'Annual signals commitment. Monthly felt tentative.'
  • Taste analytics detail sells Pro (3 mentions, taste_curator): 'Which neighborhoods I rate highest — that's the data I want.'
clarity_notes: 100% nailed_it. Maintained from V2. Product is fully understood.
appendix_notes: V3 is the diagnostic round. Its primary contribution is identifying load-bearing content for V4's surgical restoration.

bucket_deep_dives.taste_curator:
67% conversion (-8pp), 92% resonance (+9pp), 0% dealbreakers (-17pp)

Highest resonance yet but conversion dipped from losing the specific examples. Taste analytics specificity was the resonance driver.

Key personas: 'I miss the 8/10 Thai place. Those examples proved someone who thinks like me built this.'

Risk: Must restore examples in V4.
bucket_deep_dives.social_connector:
67% conversion (-8pp), 100% resonance, 0% dealbreakers

Perfect resonance. Conversion dipped modestly — product experience is now the variable, not copy.
bucket_deep_dives.journal_graveyard:
33% conversion (-9pp), 25% resonance (-25pp) 🔴

Removing the honesty line was a mistake. Resonance crashed. The three-month testimonial partially compensates but doesn't replace the direct acknowledgment.

Key personas: 'I noticed the honesty line is gone. I respected that.'

Risk: MUST restore. This is the clearest load-bearing signal in the study.
bucket_deep_dives.fomo_scroller:
75% conversion (+25pp) ⭐ Biggest V3 winner

The tighter page is dramatically better for mobile scrollers. Conversion surged to 75%.

Key personas: 'This version MOVES. I read the whole thing without losing interest.'

Risk: Don't re-expand this bucket's critical sections.
bucket_deep_dives.city_explorer:
58% conversion (-34pp) 🔴 Biggest V3 loser

Punchy one-liner doesn't do enough without context. The longer cold-start explanation was doing more work than expected.

Key personas: 'The standalone line is powerful but doesn't fully address my concern.'

Risk: Must restore 2-sentence context in V4.
